exam.question: Scientists first ______ the idea of the atom bomb in the 1930s.

answer.explain: 构想出， 设想。句意： 科学家在20世纪30年代首次构想出原子弹。imagine： 想象， 假想； consider： 考虑， 认为； acknowledge： 承认； 答谢。

exam.question: It is difficult to ______ of a plan to end poverty.

answer.explain: conceive of： 设计， 构想。句意： 构想一个结束贫困的方案是很难的。speculate： 推测， 思索； ponder： 沉思， 考虑； reckon： 估计， 猜想。

sentences.sContent: Scientists first conceived the idea of the atomic bomb in the 1930’s.
sentences.sCn: 在20世纪30年代，科学家第一次有了原子弹的设想。

sentences.sContent: ...Most high governmental officials seem to conceive of education in this light—as a way to ensure economic competitiveness and continued economic growth...

remMethod.val: con ＋ ceive(抓， 握住) → 怀有 → 怀孕

trans.tranCn: 构想出， 设想； 怀孕
trans.tranOther: to imagine a particular situation or to think about something in a particular way
to think of a new idea, plan etc and develop it in your mind
